member.name: T:BCFclass.Viewpoint
member.summary:
Viewpoint structure
The viewpoint includes :
- GUID : Globally Unique Identifier
- Index : Index of the viewpoint
- Bcfv : view position definition file name
- Snapshot : snapshot file name
- CamX, CamY, CamZ : Position of the Camera (in meters)
- DirX, DirY, DirZ : View direction
- UpX, UpY, UpZ : Up direction
- Field : Field of view in degress
- Components : List of visible components
- Image : Content of the snapshot file (bitmap)

member.name: T:BCFviewer.BCFTreeNode
member.summary:
BCFTreeNode if a class derivated from TreeNode with additional properties :
- NodeTopic : Topic reference if the TReeNodes refers to this type of element
- NodeComment : Comment reference if the TReeNodes refers to this type of element
Only one of them shall be defined, the other shall be null
